name: Handcrafted Ceramic Mug Set
description: Set of 4 uniquely designed ceramic mugs, each handcrafted with attention to detail. These mugs feature a durable glaze in earthy tones that make each piece slightly different from the others. Microwave and dishwasher safe.

name: Walnut Serving Board
description: This elegant walnut serving board is perfect for presenting cheese, charcuterie, or appetizers. Each board is handcrafted from sustainably harvested black walnut, featuring natural grain patterns that make each piece unique. Finished with food-safe oil.

name: Hand-loomed Wool Throw
description: This luxurious wool throw is hand-loomed using traditional techniques. Made from 100% merino wool in a beautiful herringbone pattern, this throw combines warmth and style. Perfect for draping over a couch or bed for added texture and comfort.

name: Sterling Silver Leaf Earrings
description: These delicate earrings feature hand-formed sterling silver leaves that catch the light beautifully. Each leaf is individually shaped, hammered for texture, and polished to a subtle shine. The earrings hang from sterling silver ear wires and measure approximately 1.5 inches in length.

name: Handmade Journal with Marbled Paper
description: This beautiful journal features a cover made from hand-marbled paper in swirling blues and golds. Each journal is bound by hand using traditional bookbinding techniques and contains 80 pages of acid-free paper suitable for writing or sketching. The unique marbling pattern means no two journals are exactly alike.

name: Hand-blown Glass Vase
description: This stunning vase is hand-blown using traditional techniques. Each vase features layers of blue and green glass that create a beautiful oceanic effect. The organic shape and unique color variations make this piece both a functional vase and a striking art object. Approximately 10 inches tall.

name: Ceramic Berry Bowl Set
description: This functional ceramic berry bowl set includes a colander bowl with drainage holes and a matching saucer. Perfect for washing and serving fresh berries or other small fruits. Handcrafted in a speckled white glaze that highlights the natural texture of the clay.

name: Maple Cutting Board with Inlay
description: This elegant cutting board is crafted from solid maple with a striking walnut inlay. The board features a juice groove around the perimeter and carved handles for easy transport. Each board is finished with food-safe mineral oil to enhance the natural wood grain.

name: Hand-printed Linen Napkin Set
description: Set of four linen napkins, each hand-printed with a botanical design in indigo blue. Made from 100% European flax linen and pre-washed for softness. These napkins add an artisanal touch to your table setting and become even softer with each wash.

name: Brass and Turquoise Cuff Bracelet
description: This striking cuff bracelet features hand-hammered brass and a natural turquoise stone. Each bracelet is shaped, textured, and polished by hand, creating a piece that sits comfortably on the wrist. The natural variations in the turquoise stone make each bracelet one-of-a-kind.

name: Block-Printed Greeting Card Set
description: Set of six greeting cards featuring original designs hand-printed using carved wooden blocks. Each card is printed on handmade paper and comes with a matching envelope. Perfect for sending a thoughtful, artisanal note for any occasion.

name: Stained Glass Suncatcher
description: This beautiful suncatcher is handcrafted using traditional stained glass techniques. Featuring pieces of colored glass soldered together in a geometric pattern, this piece catches the light beautifully when hung in a window. Each suncatcher comes with a hanging chain and measures approximately 6 inches in diameter.
